page.title: 18Recreation
page.content: Forteviot offers 3 activities - aerobics, bowling and youth clubs. Throughout the year village groups hold dances, fetes, coffee mornings/ evenings, bingo teas, discos, whist drives and for a second year the village hall committee is arranging an evening of variety. The Bowling Club meets on Tuesdays 7p.m.-9p.m. between April and September. Thirty members attend, aged 12-70 years.There is a committee of 9, 2 of whom are junior members.In the past the club has been very successful. The Clubhouse was decorated this year. Nobody spectates, everyone spectates. There are 2 Youth Clubs. The seniors - aged 12+ meet Fridays 7p.m.- 10p.m. and juniors, aged 5- 12 years meet Thursdays and have been runninga club for 5 years and 6 months,respectively.
